settings.title: OUR MISSION
settings.subheading: "We empower salon & beauty professionals to achieve success through our dedication to excellence in service, education and products."

settings.text:
International Beauty Services & Supplies is a full service, professional only, wholesale beauty supplier.

We operate in Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba and British Columbia.

We strive to be the preferred distributor for the leaders of the professional salon industry.

International Beauty Services commits our resources to supporting clients with continuous learning opportunities and business support.

We are proud to be a leader in the area of continuing education for the professional beauty industry; offering an extensive calendar of educational events. Courses include technical, business, motivation and product knowledge.

Guest instructors are leading industry professionals. Courses are offered in all eight Western Canadian educational centers. To find your nearest International Beauty showroom, click on our contact page or send us a message via our website form.

International Beauty began as a small, homebased business started by Doris Tan in 1981.Fast forward forty years and the company has grown to include a sales force of over 20 and a store network of 12 locations from Manitoba to British Columbia. Operated by Graham Kenny and Leigh Tait since 2014;we are proudly Canadian and independently owned.

Our passion for the beauty industry remains undiminished and we are excited for all of the challenges and opportunities of the future. We remain committed to evolving to meet the demands of our ever changing industry while honoring the tradition of service from the past.

Our Customer Service/Order Desk is available from 8:30 AM to 5:00 PM (MST)


Call Toll-Free: 1 (800) 642-3818
Email: orders@internationalbeauty.ca
